archimate:Capability.name: Incident Management
archimate:Capability.documentation: Ability to define, assign, assess, and track a substantive, serious, unexpected, and sometimes dangerous situation, occurrence, emergency, or potential breach of policy or legislation requiring swift action, involving operations, constituents, bio-organisms, or geographic space.

properties.value: Ability to define, assign, assess, and track a substantive, serious, unexpected, and sometimes dangerous situation, occurrence, emergency, or potential breach of policy or legislation requiring swift action, involving operations, constituents, bio-organisms, or geographic space.
